channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Wet dog fouling on the pavement which is in front of 93 Fernhead Road., 16th July
item.description:
Wet dog fouling on the pavement which is in front of 93 Fernhead Road. The fouling is in front of the small brick wall which is in front of 93 and 95 Fernhead Road. Thank you in anticipation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 95, Fernhead Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog fouling on the pavement besides a tree which is in front of 277 Shirland Road., 16th July
item.description:
Yesterday I reported to you about :"Extreme wet dog fouling on the pavement besides a which is in front of 277 Shirland Road". This has been partially removed, but there is still a great deal that is still there!! The whole area needs a through wash down. I also reported to you about :"Vomit on the pavement which is in front of 255 Shirland Road". This has been partially cleaned, but there is still a huge amount of vomit left on the pavement. The whole area needs a through wash down. Thank you in anticipation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 95, Fernhead Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 5.55pm tuesday 15th july 2025 On going antisocisl behaviour nuisance from 57 phillipp street n1 5pa. Mark statham and three of his friends sitting in there car on phillipp street. One of mark statham friend got out the car an hid drugs and knife in the bushes outside catherine house then they were loitering around there car for ten minutes before they left. Black car with tinted windows. Not sure of the number plate of the car., 16th July
item.description:
5.55pm tuesday 15th july 2025 antisocial behaviour from 57 phillipp street n1 5pa

item.title: 2nd broken bench, 16th July
item.description:
1 bench OUTSIDE the garden square (the modern benches right opposite the Eliz Line entrance) has a broken metal armrest which needs reattaching. I know this is a very similar report to the one I just made, but it is two separate benches ! Thanks so much WCC you are fantastic.
